msbt.message: Let's talk! Let's chat! What's the latest? I wanna chat!
It's nothing. Just saying hi.
Chat with me! Let's talk. Lay it on me! I came by for a chat!
See ya around. See you later. I'll be seeing you.
Whaddaya want? One more time? Come again?
I brought a bug! I've got a bug!
I brought something! I caught something!
You drop this? You lose this? Drop something?
I found it! Is this it? You dropped this.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
I delivered it! I delivered it! I handed it over!
Delivery here! Delivery! Delivery time!
Furniture.
Clothing.
furniture
clothing
This is for you. This is yours! Do you want this?
That's right. Yep.
Not anymore.
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Yeah. OK.
That's not right. Wait a second...
Yep, yep! Seems that way.
Really? You don't say.
I DO know! Yep, I know all!
Don't know... Hmm, I wonder...
Yep. Yeah!
Nope. Not so much.
Something else.
